---
title: "Extended Reality Parasocial Interaction"
description: |
  A study undertaken to explore the nuanced parasocial interaction and relationships when in extended reality environments.
draft: false
image: featured.jpeg

about:
  image: featured.jpeg
---

This project uses head-mounted displays (HMDs) and commercial off-the-shelf virtual reality experiences to explore the differences that arise when interaction and relationships are mediated with these technologies compared to more traditional screen-based media.
